segments.text: Dave , there's something I want to talk to you about .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've been talking to WebTracker . I'm thinking of jumping ship .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ? Are you serious ? You'd defect to our archrival ! ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Keep your voice down . We'll talk more later . Right now I need to see Vince .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We definitely have to talk , Zina . And watch your back . Elvin is still mad about his nose .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , but don't tell anyone what I said .
segments.speaker: S1
